basics.label: Finance Officer
basics.summary: To attain a full-time position in the accounting and finance field where I can utilize the concepts I have learned and the experience I have gained to add value to the company.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed working funds of the office. Maintained general ledger of the office. Reconciled sub-ledgers to general ledger account. Reviewed financial status to ensure there are no discrepancies.
highlights: Managed working funds of the office
Maintained general ledger of the office
Reconciled sub-ledgers to general ledger account
Reviewed financial status to ensure there are no discrepancies

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Handled accounting and financial reports. Entertained visitors of the Tourism Director. Answered phone inquiries and mailed brochures and promotional materials they requested.
highlights: Entertained visitors of the Tourism Director
Answered phone inquiries and mailed brochures

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Finance Officer and Acting BIR Representative
work.summary: Managed Consulate funds averaging $600,000 per month. Transferred funds among other foreign offices averaging $50,000 per transaction. Coordinated activities for fiscal agents.
highlights: Transferred funds among other foreign offices

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Examined financial reports of Foreign Service posts. Prepared reports of disbursements and collections of posts. Liquidated cash advances of assistant secretaries and ambassadors.
highlights: Prepared reports of disbursements and collections
